name: Thanh Hang Hotel Hanoi
address: 180 Dinh Thon, My Dinh National Stadium, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Offering quality accommodations in the business district of Hanoi, Thanh Hang Hotel Hanoi is a popular pick for both business and leisure travelers. Only from the city center, the hotel's strategic location ensures that guests can quickly and easily reach many local points of interest. With its convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the city's must-see destinations.

The facilities and services provided by Thanh Hang Hotel Hanoi ensure a pleasant stay for guests. For the comfort and convenience of guests, the hotel offers 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, portable wi-fi rental, taxi service.

In addition, all guestrooms feature a variety of comforts. Many rooms even provide towels, mirror, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms to please the most discerning guest. Besides, the hotel's host of recreational offerings ensures you have plenty to do during your stay. Thanh Hang Hotel Hanoi is a smart choice for travelers to Hanoi, offering a relaxed and hassle-free stay every time.
